document_data.mainbody:
Sentinel Olak was a goblin warrior and lookout that helped guard the Shattered Sanctum, one of the outposts of the cult of the Absolute, during the late 15 century DR.
Olak wore a suit of modified chainmail armor, adorned with leather scraps and bones. He also bore the mark of the Absolute.
Rather than attack non-goblins on sight, Olak preferred to berate and threaten anyone that dared approach him.
He had a "pet" worg named Klaw.
Unfortunately, Olak did not participate in the celebration following his bands raid on the Waukeens Rest. He had guard duty at the outpost just outside the Shattered Sanctum.
